channel.title: Meebscape [317][PI]
channel.description:
Hello, I've edited a small server off a project insanity base. The name of the server is 'meebscape', don't ask why. I just wanted a pure pk server, although I did add some monsters to kill. Here are some pictures...Enjoy!
A little about me, I'm a college junior studying computer science. I attend a private university located in the midwestern part of the United States. I used to play runescape in high school and middle school, but now the game has changed so much that it isn't fun. I mess with private server on my free time and I might put this server online sometime in the next couple weeks.
UPDATE: The server is now online, [url=http://meebscape.webs.com]meebscape.webs.com[/url]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img707/2069/zrpt.jpg[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img208/1859/udub.jpg[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img844/1598/jrtc.jpg[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img837/3194/6cel.jpg[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img842/6646/wvc8.jpg[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img20/1716/hiar.jpg[/img]

item.title: Meebscape [317][PI]
item.dc:creator: @meebscape meebscape
item.description:
@meebscape wrote:

@Soulcist I know I would need to add more features to keep people coming back but I wanted the main focus to be pking. I would probably send the client to a few friends, and pk on the server with them on my free time. It’s nothing serious at this stage, but I might expand it in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Meebscape [317][PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’m 50-50 on this, there is something about this that would attract me, don’t know the reason, however, I don’t think this server would want me to continue to play on-and-on, do you plan on expanding on any sort-of ground as far as the features? And how do you plan on adding special features that would want people to come and play it.

Read full topic
